dialog.label: Update page information
dialog.hint: A change of a WYSIWYG section will update the last modified field of the page (recommend!)

dialog.label: Use relative MEDIA URL
dialog.hint: Replace the URL of files from the MEDIA directory with a placeholder while saving the WYSIWYG content (recommend!)

dialog.label: max. Archives in Selection
dialog.hint: The maximum number of archives that will be shown in the selection list

dialog.label: Create Archive Files
dialog.hint: If activated extendedWYSIWYG will create a protected directory in the /MEDIA path and create a HTML page of each content that get the status BACKUP. The embedded images will be also saved.

dialog.label: Max. Logfile size
dialog.hint: The maximum size of the logfile in Kilobytes

dialog.label: max. page levels
dialog.hint: The maximum page levels shown in the selection list for the department root parent

dialog.label: Use Editorial department
dialog.hint: Specify if you want to use the Editorial department system of extendedWYSIWYG or not. Please read the documentation before you activate the Editorial department!
